com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures

Class UserUVCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures.UserUVCollection

  • public class UserUVCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of UV coordinates. The coords are stored in groups defined by the material index and their UV set name.

      • addUV

        public void addUV(int materialIndex,
         java.lang.String uvSetName,
         Vector2f uv,
         int jmeVertexIndex)
        Adds a single UV coordinates for a specified vertex index.
        Parameters:
        materialIndex - the material index
        uvSetName - the UV set name
        uv - the added UV coordinates
        jmeVertexIndex - the index of the vertex in result jme mesh

      • getUVForVertex

                      int vertexIndex)
        Parameters:
        uvSetName - the name of the UV set
        vertexIndex - the vertex index corresponds to the index in jme mesh and not the original one in blender

      • getUVCoordinates

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Vector2f>> getUVCoordinates(int materialNumber)
        Parameters:
        materialNumber - the material number that is appied to the mesh
        Returns:
        UV coordinates of vertices that belong to the required mesh part
